(4,): As a system administrator, I want to configure logging for submissions, so that all activities are properly recorded for auditing and debugging
(2,): As a submission manager, I want to track the publish status of submissions, so that I can monitor their lifecycle from draft to published or failed As a FABS validator, I want to validate a submission file, so that I can ensure it meets the required format and content standards As a publisher, I want to publish a FABS submission, so that it moves from draft to published status if validation passes As a UX researcher, I want to conduct user testing, so that I can gather feedback on design changes As a data analyst, I want to receive submission updates, so that I can stay informed about new or modified data
(1,): As a data submitter, I want to update the publish status of a submission, so that its state reflects the latest changes accurately As a DABS submitter, I want to sync FPDS data with a submission, so that it includes the latest procurement information
(0,): As a validator, I want to add validation errors to a submission, so that issues can be tracked and resolved As a data entry specialist, I want to add flexible fields to a submission, so that additional metadata can be included As a UI designer, I want to redesign a page, so that the user interface can be improved based on feedback As a project coordinator, I want to schedule user testing, so that it can be planned and executed efficiently As a DevOps engineer, I want to configure New Relic for applications, so that performance can be monitored
(3,): As a reviewer, I want to retrieve validation errors for a submission, so that I can assess its compliance with requirements As a FABS submitter, I want to upload a file for a submission, so that it can be processed and validated As a DABS processor, I want to generate a D file for a submission, so that it can be used for downstream reporting
